title: Penalty Kill
description: Three years ago, I escaped. Three years of living a new life. Three years of living a lie.But that's over now.They know where I am and they're coming. I have to run.Evan Langford was sent to make sure I returned to my new life, but he has no idea who he's protecting. I doubt that he'd still keep me safe if he found out... I'm not the girl he thinks I am.I'm not Chloe Meade.I'm the one he should be afraid of. They all should. Because I'm not a victim.I am a killer.
author: Rebel Farris
